title: Pumpkin and turkey chilli
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '160g chopped onion', '75g chopped green pepper', '75g chopped yellow pepper', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '450g minced turkey', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '500g pumpkin puree', '1 1/2 tablespoons chilli powder', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 dash salt', '60g grated Cheddar cheese', '125ml soured cream']
